input.sentences: had a little get together with some friends today .
just hanging out and having good food and even better company .
the guests just kept pouring in .
the wife made this beautiful setup to keep us lighted at night .
ca n't forget the campfire ! nice cozy day .
output.sentences: My friends are starting to show up for my pre concert get together.
We spoke for a bit, and ate a bit.
We all are leaving to go to the concert.
We enjoy the live concert together.
Afterwards, we have a bonfire at the house to end the day.
